data.title: Ukraine: population by region 2022
data.meta_description: The Donetsk Oblast in eastern Ukraine was the most populated region of the country as of February 1, 2022, with approximately 4.1 million inhabitants.
data.text:
Population of Ukraine 2022, by region

Supplementary notes

The source stopped publishing figures on the Autonomous Republic of Crimea and the city of Sevastopol because they were annexed by Russia in 2014. However, most countries worldwide do not recognize them as part of Russia.

Release date is the date of access.
